skill.name: Opentrons Integration
skill.description: Lab automation platform for Flex/OT-2 robots. Write Protocol API v2 protocols, liquid handling, hardware modules (heater-shaker, thermocycler), labware management, for automated pipetting workflows.
skill.summary: Write Opentrons robot protocols for automated liquid handling and lab workflows
skill.author: Claude Code Templates

security_audit.summary: This is a knowledge/documentation skill containing protocol templates for Opentrons lab robots. Contains no executable code, network operations, file system access, or environment variable usage. All Python files are template definitions using the official opentrons library API.

content.user_title: Create Opentrons robot protocols for lab automation
content.value_statement: Writing protocols for Opentrons Flex and OT-2 robots requires knowledge of Protocol API v2 and lab automation concepts. This skill provides templates, code examples, and documentation for liquid handling, hardware module control, and automated pipetting workflows.
actual_capabilities: Write Protocol API v2 protocols for Opentrons Flex and OT-2 robots
Configure pipettes, labware, and hardware modules (temperature, magnetic, heater-shaker, thermocycler)
Implement liquid handling operations (aspirate, dispense, transfer, distribute, consolidate)
Create serial dilution and plate replication workflows
Set up PCR reactions with thermocycler cycling profiles
Use multi-channel pipettes for 96-well plate operations
limitations: Does not connect to or control physical robots directly
Requires opentrons library installation for protocol execution
Protocols must be simulated or uploaded to Opentrons robot for execution
Robot-specific calibration and deck layout must be configured separately

use_cases.title: Automate PCR setup
use_cases.description: Generate PCR protocols with master mix distribution, sample addition, and thermocycler cycling

use_cases.title: Create serial dilutions
use_cases.description: Build concentration gradient protocols for assay development across 96-well plates

use_cases.title: Design liquid handling workflows
use_cases.description: Develop complex protocols for automated sample processing and plate replication

prompt_templates.title: Basic Protocol
prompt_templates.prompt: Write an Opentrons protocol that transfers 100uL from well A1 to well B1 on a 96-well plate using a p300_single_flex pipette on the left mount with a 200ul tip rack

prompt_templates.title: Thermocycler Setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an Opentrons Flex protocol that sets up 8 PCR reactions in a thermocycler. Include master mix distribution to all wells and adding template DNA from a tube rack

prompt_templates.title: Serial Dilution
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a protocol for serial dilution across row A of a 96-well plate. Start with stock in column 1 and perform 1:2 dilutions through column 12 using a p300 pipette

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Module Control
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a protocol that uses a heater-shaker module at 37C with shaking, then transfers samples to a temperature module set to 4C. Include proper labware latches and hardware coordination

best_practices: Always specify the latest API level (2.19) in protocol metadata for new protocols
Use protocol.is_simulating() to test and debug protocols before running on robot
Add protocol.comment() throughout code for logging and debugging during execution
anti_patterns: Hardcoding labware names without verifying compatibility with your robot type
Running protocols without first simulating to catch errors
Skipping tip rack capacity calculations leading to out-of-tips errors

faq.question: Which Opentrons robots are supported?
faq.answer: Both Flex and OT-2 models are supported. Set robotType in requirements to 'Flex' or 'OT-2'.

faq.question: What API versions work with this skill?
faq.answer: Protocols use API level 2.19 by default. Older versions (2.0-2.18) are documented for compatibility.
